facts.fact: Documentation exists describing the Kas to iKas bridge for the Igra L2.
facts.context: Indicates there is formal design or implementation supporting asset bridging between Kas (Kaspa) and iKas for the Igra Layer 2 protocol, which is significant for interoperability and enabling use cases involving cross-layer or cross-asset transactions within the Kaspa ecosystem.

technical.fact: Documentation exists describing the Kas to iKas bridge for the Igra L2.
